column4: Guys, i am unable to telnet to my router.. What could be the reason ???
are you sure you are using the correct IP for your router?
Yeah... its the default one that i use.. 192.168.1.1
linksys?
yeah... does it not support ??
what model
WAG200G
nope, no telnet access, only http on that one
When it says trying 192.168.1.1 and then Connected 192.168.1.1 then after that nothing happens...
I have another peculiar prob... http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=883688 please look into this for a sec.
someone suggested the page might not work correctly in firefox
But its not working even in Opera... And its working wid firefox on opensuse and windows
Any clue ???
no idea, didn't see anything on google either :(
Yeah, same here... Have been lookin for it since such a long time. Even upgraded the firmware but no use...
if it were me, i would install the HTTPFox extension, then try to access the page and see if any errors appear that might help me narrow down the problem
wats the HTTPFox extension ???
check it out:  https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/6647
it basically shows you any elements on the page that might be erroring out, etc
ohh kewl... I'll just check out..!!
Hey, gotcha... Its a prob with some javascript execution.. What could be done about that ??
what kind of error is it,  is it like a 404 missing .js page?
maybe try googling those results from that error you found
Can javascript be upgraded for firefox ?? I'm using ff 3
